formations.description: Obtaining engineer degree of ENIB with the computer engineering specialization.

courses.title: Computer Engineering Methods
courses.description: Algorithmics, Programming paradigms, Model Driven Engineering, Compilation languages and techniques.

courses.title: Architecture des systèmes
courses.description: Systèmes embarqués, Systèmes en réseaux, Architectures distribuées, Administration réseaux.

courses.title: Information Systems
courses.description: Industrial information systems, Man-machine interfaces, Service-oriented programming,  Web development.

courses.title: Modeling Complex Systems
courses.description: Virtual Reality, Modeling and simulation, Knowledge-driven engineering.
